fn.p: Conflict of Interests Statement: The authors declare that there is no conflict of interests regarding the publication of this article.

Financial Disclosure Statement: The scientific activity of Grzegorz Woźniakowski is supported by the project no. S/343 executed within the NVRI’s statutory responsibilities entitled: “Determination of the role of insects from the Tabanidae family, Stomoxys calcitrans, mosquitos ( Culicidae), and culicoides ( Chironomoidea) in spread of African swine fever virus (ASFV) in the population of wild boars and domestic pigs”. The part of the study conducted by Grzegorz Woźniakowski was supported by the National Science Centre (grant no. UMO-2016/21/D/NZ6/00974).
